current.title: Grand Entry Hall - 1822 Pine Street
current.alt: Historic entry hall with original 1854 checkerboard marble floors and stained glass transom at 1822 Pine Street Philadelphia
current.caption: The grand entry features original 1854 checkerboard marble floors, worn by 170 years of footsteps

current.title: Primary Bedroom Suite - Second Floor
current.alt: Luxurious primary bedroom with four-poster bed and crystal chandelier in historic Rittenhouse Square mansion
current.caption: The Primary Suite retains its 1899 Duhring, Okie & Ziegler architectural details

current.title: Double Parlors - First Floor
current.alt: Elegant double parlors with 14-foot ceilings where Philadelphia suffragettes held meetings in 1915
current.caption: These parlors hosted suffragette meetings and society gatherings throughout the Progressive Era

current.title: Designer Bathroom - Victorian Elegance
current.alt: Luxurious bathroom with dramatic wallpaper and pedestal sink in 1822 Pine Street historic mansion
current.caption: Modern luxury meets Victorian elegance in the beautifully appointed bathrooms
